name: Swing (itch) (Sazails)
description:
Swing - Sazails Studio

This is a game about gravity and dodging the rockets. Currently there are no objectives, just to wonder around and feel the gameplay.

I have the PC and Android version, please test them out especially the android version and see how the performance is and any feedback you can give me is really appreciated!

Sadly no chill music as I don't want any used music, I'll make my own or just look for a person in the future of this development.

Thank you.

https://gamejolt.com/games/swing/376981
